title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5010.1 - Establishment of fund
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5010.1 - Establishment of fund

State Regulations

Pursuant to sections
517
and
613
of the Retirement and Social Security

Law, the system shall establish a special fund, to be known as the Tier 3/4/5

Member Contributions Fund, to account for the contributions deducted from
members' wages. All monies withheld from such members' wages shall be recorded
in individual accounts within such fund, and all withdrawals and refunds of
such contributions shall be deducted from the accounts in such
fund. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5010.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
